"Hangry Hanger" - A clothes hanger with a built-in food holder that can hold snacks or small meals while you're getting dressed.
"Smart Hanger" - A clothes hanger that uses sensors to keep track of your clothes and reminds you when it's time to wash or dry clean them.
"Multi-Purpose Hanger" - A clothes hanger with multiple hooks and shelves that can be used to hang clothes, bags, shoes, and accessories.
"Space-Saving Hanger" - A clothes hanger that can fold flat when not in use, saving valuable closet space.
"Eco-Friendly Hanger" - A clothes hanger made from sustainable materials such as bamboo or recycled plastic, reducing your environmental impact.
